import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { RightOutlined, PlusOutlined, LeftOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons"; import save from "../../images/save.svg"; import check from "../../images/check.svg"; import product2 from "../../images/product2.svg"; import basketwhite from "../../images/basketwhite.svg"; import Card from "../../components/card"; import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { BASE_URL, axiosInstance } from "../../utils/axiosIntance"; import { Context } from "../../context/context"; const Product = () => { const history = useHistory(); const { id } = useParams(); const { dil } = useContext(Context); const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); const [img, setImg] = useState(); useEffect(() => { getProduct(); }, []); const getProduct = () => { axiosInstance .get("/api/product/" + id) .then((data) => { console.log(data.data); data.data.ProductImgs.length > 0 && setImg(data.data.ProductImgs[0]); setProduct(data.data); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
history.push({ pathname: "/" })} className="text-[14px] cursor-pointer font-[500] text-[#888888]" > Ba≈ü sahapa
history.push({ pathname: "/category/id" })} className="text-[14px] cursor-pointer font-[500] text-[#888888]" > {dil == "tm" ? product?.Category?.name_tm : dil == "ru" ? product?.Category?.name_ru : product?.Category?.name_en}
{dil == "tm" ? product?.Brand?.name_tm : dil == "ru" ? product?.Brand?.name_ru : product?.Brand?.name_en}
{product?.bar_code}
{product?.ProductImgs?.map((item) => { return (
setImg(item)} className={`w-[90px] flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer h-[90px] bg-footerBackground rounded-[6px] border-[1px] ${ item.id == img.id && "border-black" }`} >
); })}

{dil == "tm" ? product?.name_tm : dil == "ru" ? product?.name_ru : product?.name_en}

Bar kod: {product?.bar_code}

{product?.is_valyuta ? product?.usd_price + " USD" : product?.price + " TMT"}

) : (

{product?.is_valyuta ? product?.usd_price + " USD" : product?.price + " TMT"}

)}
